htmlbody:
The "Introducing Participedia" event, hosted by the Centre for the Study of Democracy (CSD) at the University of Westminster, will feature a keynote address by Bridgette Wessels of the University of Sheffield, an introduction to Participedia by Graham Smith of the University of Westminster, and a virtual Question and Answer session with Participedia co-founder Archon Fung of Harvard University. Everyone is welcome and encouraged to join us for this event.

What: Introducing Participedia

Cost: Free

When: 27th January 2014, 17.00 – 19.30

Where: University of Westminster, 309 Regent Street

London W1B 2HW

Click here to tell us you’re coming

Click here to watch a video of Graham Smith talking about Participedia

 

Keynote Address:

The dynamics of social media, civic participation and political culture

Bridgette Wessels

University of Sheffield

Director of the Centre of Interdisciplinary Research in Soio-Digital Worlds

 

Introduction to Participedia

Graham Smith

Centre for the Study of Democracy

University of Westminster

 

Questions and Answers

Archon Fung

Ash Center for Democratic Governance and Innovation

John F. Kennedy School of Government, Harvard University
title: Introducing Participedia - Big Event in London!
